short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clinch: AI-platform for customer-centric communication. Craft personalized messages at scale, boost engagement instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clinch Chrome Extension revolutionizes personalized prospecting! It is ideal for for sales reps, SDRs, and business owners seeking seamless customer connections.

With Clinch Chrome Extension, simply provide your business context and craft tailored communication effortlessly, wherever you are. You can also use AI Instant Reply feature in Gmail and Hubspot to respond to customer questions.

Let’s dive into a LinkedIn use case: as you browse a potential customer profile, click the Clinch Button to draft a message tailored to their role, industry, background, and recent activity.

Need more context? Just customize further. For instance, if it’s a warm lead from SaaStr, adjust the message and request a meeting seamlessly. Boost, shorten, lengthen, or translate the message as needed.

Saving time is easy—use the Template gallery for pre-configured single click AI templates that can be used to message prospects on LinkedIn, Salesforce, or Hubspot.
